DOC.brief_summary: `` Sporty Bellies '' intervention program pregnant woman , base promotion healthy lifestyle . It aim evaluate impact program health pregnant newborn . This trial conduct 313 pregnant woman , divide control intervention group . Are perform 3 assessment period : 1 - begin program ; 2 - postpartum ; 3 - 1 month delivery . The intervention group program 3 weekly physical exercise class control group basic information usually provide health professional . With program , expect contribute evidence best practice field intervention pregnancy improve health outcome pregnant newborn .
DOC.brief_title: Sporty Bellies - Intervention Program During Pregnancy Women Newborn
DOC.criteria: Do medical obstetric contraindication physical exercise Haemodynamically significant heart disease ; restrictive lung disease ; incompetent cervix/cerclage ; multiple gestation risk premature labor ; persistent second third trimester bleeding ; placenta praevia 26 week gestation ; premature labor current pregnancy ; rupture membrane ; pregnancy induce hypertension ; severe anaemia ; unevaluated maternal cardiac arrhythmia ; chronic bronchitis ; poorly control type I diabetes ; extreme morbid obesity ; extreme underweight ( body mass index < 12 ) ; history extremely sedentary lifestyle ; intrauterine growth restriction current pregnancy ; poorly control hypertension/preeclampsia ; orthopaedic limitation ; poorly control seizure disorder ; poorly control thyroid disease ; heavy smoker ) .
